Articles.Content:
Hello

I have been playing Kerbal Space Program for nearly three months. As a young child, I've dreamed about going into space and exploring the unknown. When I've became older I started building my own rockets and lunching them on my backyard. Then three months ago I came across a Scott Manley youtube video and became hook. Now I'm a new forum member, I came here to seek help.

Edited January 28, 2015 by capt.jamesfox

Welcome to the forums!

There is always a lot of help available here. And a lot of people who love space, of course.

Happy landings!

Welcome aboard!

I've always wanted to get into model rocketry, but never had enough funds (or a decent launch area). Then I found KSP! There's always plenty of like-minded folks to talk to, so have fun!
Welcome to the KSP Community! Have fun!
